Reviews.Title: “Friendly service in a great location”
Reviews.Author: Chris B
Reviews.Content: excellent location gran via super close metro stations restaurants bars staff friendly helpful book dinner reservations tickets etc informative supermarkets helped alternative transportation airport 4am shelling 30euro cab furnished comfortable bed lots lighting choices mirrors closet safe flat screen tv free wifi easy access reentering passcode reception bathroom awesome shower bathroom separated glass wall glass door difficult bumping bed didnt close absolutely bathroom dont hearing travel companion care business tv walk nature calls windows looked shaft view reviewer photos looks unlucky elevator cool downside forgot close gate upper floors elevator walk flights stairs surrounding elevator shaft 3rd floor wasnt hassle left credit card didnt pay cash days returning home seeing bank statement found card indeed wed double charged contacted hotel couple days reviewed records found double paid immediately refunded apologetic polite helpful

Reviews.Title: “nicely situated hotel in madrid for reasonable price”
Reviews.Author: Tsarmuh
Reviews.Content: hotel center madrid close metro station lot sightseeing near gran via avenues city trip business fun building recently renovated bathroom near whatever shops supermarkets bars tube 2 3 stops prado museum royal palace plaza mayor love 1st sight plaza del sol el corte ingles walk lift building breakfast served building door try book months look special offers discounts recommend hotel

Reviews.Content: struck lucky hotel maybe stay week 5th floor advisable stay noise traffic balcony partner able smoke suffer smokers size adequate clean throughout stay ac quiet mini heatwave position couldnt gran via road taxi rank caught taxi airport didnt book 8 cabs waiting 25 euros euros catching night bus 10 euros cheaper cab airport arrival day fallen love madrid toledo decide spain visit

Reviews.Title: “Nice staff, great location, room was a closet”

Reviews.Title: “Strongly recommend this hotel”
Reviews.Author: Posted by an Easytobook.com traveler
Reviews.Content: stay hotel met nice staffthe hotel fantastic location value money provide excellent internet connection am return hotel time visit madrid

Reviews.Title: “Great Location small rooms”
Reviews.Author: nicksie99
Reviews.Content: fantastically located hotel gran via metro easy crammed space bathroom glass wall privacy dont stay beds ok cleaned late chance late sleep dont paid breakfast time 1030am arrive 920am theres fruit left staff switched toaster breakfast staff welcoming 5 night stay 4 breakfast buenos dias whats people en espana decent breakfast staff ladies recepetion helpful friendly professional staff employed overall hotel location reception staff

Reviews.Title: “Helpful staff, aging rooms”
Reviews.Author: Matt F
Reviews.Content: stayed 2 nights week friendly reception service required plate fork knife immediately provided quirky features 1 cant sit desk bumping chair bed 2 bathroom door blocks easy access bathroom sliders designers 3 shower body spray functional frankly makes bathroom floor wet 4 lacking cold blanket ripped 5 walls thin hear step cough neighbors location easy fun madrid

Reviews.Title: “Excellent”
Reviews.Author: lbello1962
Reviews.Content: stayed 5 days 206 staff hotel people max experiance spain middle everthing people start partying 2 am dont stop til 6 am prepared convenient close sorts shops food drunken duck bar street cheap filling breakfast

Reviews.Content: advantage location close standards basically doesnt fit description website upgrade superior reception told superior obviously cheated bathroom stuck bed space moreover glass wall bathrooms movements seen sounds heard romm bad smell humidity cleaning ladies noisy morning forget rest night bar hotel basically service skip
